title: Integrated Design of Ecological Dynamics-Based Methodologies for High-Performance Team Sports Organizations in K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational sports organization management, team dynamics theory, and understanding of self-regulated learning concepts
context.additional_context: A process where learners (administrative staff) analyze methodology integration in team sports organizations from a language domain perspective

learning_goals: Learners can propose a training task design framework for team sports organizations by applying ecological dynamics theory.
Learners can develop personalized training programs that adapt to changes in competitive environments using self-regulated learning principles.
Learners can establish an action plan integrating sports science and coaching methodologies through an interdisciplinary collaboration model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
